mods.abstract: Set in India in 1938, "The Rains Came" stars Myrna Loy as Lady Edwina Esketh, the privileged wife of British aristocrat Lord Albert Esketh (Nigel Bruce). While visiting the picturesque town of Ranchipur, Lady Esketh meets a former lover, Tom Ransome (George Brent), who is now being pursued by sheltered Fern Simon (Brenda Joyce). Soon after this reunion, Lady Esketh becomes fascinated by Major Rama Safti (Tyrone Power) and pursues him even though Ransome, his closest friend, warns her that he is completely devoted to his medical practice. Before anything can be decided, the city is struck by heavy rains, earthquakes, flooding, polluted water, and finally plague. These disasters force all of the characters to consider carefully what is truly important to them.
